markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Head Stomp](/Feats.aspx?ID=1785) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 135 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Make an unarmed melee attack against a [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) target. On a hit, the target becomes [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to all attacks until the end of your next turn.
name: Head Stomp
